name: Otherside (Kristóf Morva)
description:
A small platformer puzzle game created for the 2019 Spring UE4 Jam.

I have used the theme "Other side of the coin" in the figurative sense instead of the literal one: a different way of considering a situation. Gameplay-wise it works by having two different worlds, between which the player can switch. Some objects are visible in both levels, while some only in one. The game introduces puzzles built around these mechanics.
